lines.content: I have been using Cursor, which is a fork of VS Code, to help me minimize "handcoding" for the iP.

In my experience, it is much better than the AI assistance on IDEA, as well as Github Copilot. For most increments, it suffices to give it a description from the course website and it requires no prompt engineering, and minimal editing afterwards.
Noga is a streamlined, text-based task manager designed to help you stay organized effortlessly. It's:
3. `deadline <description> /by <yyyy-MM-dd>` – Adds a task with a deadline.
5. `mark <task number>` – Marks a task as completed.
6. `unmark <task number>` – Marks a task as not done.
Stay organized with Noga—the reliable way to manage your tasks!

Noga is a streamlined, text-based task manager designed to help you stay organized effortlessly. It's:
3. `deadline <description> /by <yyyy-MM-dd>` – Adds a task with a deadline.
5. `mark <task number>` – Marks a task as completed.
6. `unmark <task number>` – Marks a task as not done.
Stay organized with Noga—the reliable way to manage your tasks!
